question: 飽くまでも
sourceMnemonic: I'm so <kanji>bored</kanji>. On top of my boredom is <ja>くまでも</ja>. If you took this separately, it would mean "even as a bear." So it's like you're saying I'm so <kanji>bored</kanji>, even if I was a bear. If you're so bored that you'd be bored even as a bear, you're going to be bored <vocabulary>to the last</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to the end</vocabulary>. Nothing will please you, you bored bear person.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading already when you learned <ja>飽きる</ja> so you should be able to read this one too!
